name: Freddy Fazbear's Bear Hunter
description:
Welcome To Freddy Fazbear's Bear Hunter! A game where you hunt bears as freddy himself. Aim for a high score while destroying all bears you see!

"Damn, Rip." - Combine, playtester
"Last time i fucked your mom!" - Yello87, also playtester.

Hours of fun content for you and children to enjoy!Will receive updates in the near future.
